*In the People's Base, Wrath and Kamodia convert to robot mode and come out=
 of the hidden passage way in the swamp and run into the jungle and see Dra=
zom and Mantella next to a stasis pod and a Scorpion. They hide in a bush l=
istening to every word* *Over with Drazom and Mantella* Mantella: We come i=
n peace. *The new bot converts to robot mode. Then Mantella holds her hand =
out for a hand shake* *Mantella: I'm Mantella and this is Drazom. *Mantella=
 says while pointing at Drazom. Drazom does a little wave* Stingtra: I'm St=
ingtra. *Stingtra says while shaking Mantella's hand* Drazom: Maybe you'd l=
ike to join us? Stingtra: That'd be great. It beats looking for a base anyd=
ay! *Wrath and Kamodia hear this from the bush their hiding in* Wrath: Well=
 well well, If it isn't Stinktra and the sideshow freaks! *Wrath says as he=
 and Kamodia step out from behind the bush* *Stingtra's optics narrow*  *St=
ingtra pulls out her Machine gun and starts shooting at Kamodia while Drazo=
m picks Mantella up and throws her at Wrath attemping to knock him down but=
 instead Wrath catches Mantella holds her up in air and throws her the grou=
nd. Then Kamodia slips under the Machine gun shots and charges at Stingtra =
knocking her down. Wrath then picks Mantella up and pins her to a tree and =
starts puching her but it doesn't last long before Drazom walks over and pu=
nches Wrath and with that Wrath falls on his bum holding his face. Then Dra=
zom pulls him up and starts kneeing him in the gut and then drops him to th=
e ground. Stingtra starts head butting Kamodia in the face till Kamodia get=
s off of Stingtra. Then Stingtra jumps to her feet and picks up a stick and=
 runs at Kamodia with it but Kamodia grabs the stick and swings Stingtra ar=
ound drops her on ground. And Kamodia charges at Stingtra but Stingtra is o=
n her back and she scoops Kamodia up on her feet and flips her face first i=
nto a tree and Kamodia falls to the ground in pain. Then Stingtra jumps to =
her feet. Wrath climbs to his feet and kicks Drazom in gut. Then Wrath star=
ts rapidly punching Mantella over and over again till she spits poison in h=
is optics. Wrath falls to the ground yelling being blind at the moment* Dra=
zom: I think Quickstrike is going to welcome you with open arms. *Drazom sa=
ys to Stingtra *Drazom, Mantella and Stingtra convert to beast mode and the=
n Drazom bends down letting Stingtra climb up  on his back and then he grab=
s Mantella in his arms and takes of flying towards the Predacon base*
